Uses of Package
it.bova.rtmapi

Classes in it.bova.rtmapi used by it.bova.rtmapi
Contact
          An object for a Remember the Milk contact id - The string unique ID fullname - The full name of the contact username - The username of the contact, used for login
DeletedTask
          An object containing relevant information about a deleted task (See SynchedTask).
Frequency
          An enum for defining recurrence frequency in tasks (See Recurrence and Task).
Group
          An object for Remember the Milk groups of contacts id - The string unique ID name - The name label of the group contactIds - A string array with the IDs of contacts contained in the group (See Contact)
Location
          An object for a Remember the Milk location.
MethodInfo
          An object containing all the necessary information for a Remember the Milk API method.
Note
          An object containing a note for Task objects.
ParsingException
          An exception for problems with parsing (JSON, dates)
Permission
          An enum for the possible server permissions
Priority
          An enum for task priorities.
Recurrence
          A class for the definition of a repetition rule for a Task.
RtmApiException
          A fatal Exception caused by this API
RtmObject
          This interface require an object to have id and name string fields, accessible by the public getters It is used heavily for RtmObjectBrowser static methods
ServerException
          An exception message thrown by the Remember the Milk server
Settings
          An object containing the user settings stored in the Remember the Milk server.
SynchedTasks
          A container for synchronization results (RtmApi for methods including last_sync parameter).
Task
          A Remember the Milk task.
TaskList
          The lists for tasks as in Remember the Milk, both non-smart and smart.
Timezone
          An object containing the timezone information.
Token
          An object containing the token string and other useful user information.
